name: Crow's Dance: The Demo
description:
A crow somehow stuck in a crystal cave! (and there is a boss that shoots and kill stuff)

PLEASE READ BELLOW!!! How to play:

downloaded version has glow turned on

  • -`W` for jump (jump on air will cost you 1 point of mana)
  • -`A` & `D` for moving to left and right
  • -`S` for gliding (cost mana, too!)
  • -`space` for interact
  • -`K` for attack

This demo game is not yet completed (not feature-complete). I want to take a good rest, fix my motivation and find my joy back. While I am taking a break from the development (this means the whole development is put into a halt), you can enjoy the unfinished version..?

Credits:
  • Nstryder, The boss fight's theme: Waltz Und Basse by Nstryder (Big thanks for him to allow me to use his work!)
  • Rechie Kho (Me), everything (other than the boss fight theme mentioned) is made through my hands, my blood, my soul and etc. (here is my twitter account)
